Questions & Answers

Karleen L.asked 3 weeks ago
Console BC800

To the Birde team: will programmable make-your-own cards be available any time soon? I would love to buy a Birde but am realising that this feature which is available in other similar devices like Yoto is actually very important for the longevity of the products use, not being limited to select content also.

More
No answers
Karleen L.asked 3 weeks ago
Console BC800

Just wondering if a seed has multiple tracks, does the child have to listen in order, or is there a way of selecting the track of their choice? Thank you.

Share
More
2 answers
BirdeBirde
3 weeks ago

Hello! All your little one needs to do is tap the seed on their Birde player again and it will skip to the next track. You can also use the app to select specific tracks for your child. However we kno...

Read morew that most little ones enjoy tapping until they find their favourite song or story. Hope that helps!
Report
Karleen L.3 weeks ago

Thank you, that is helpful, sounds like a great feature.

Report

Console BC800

Is it possible to record one's own seeds? eg for a parent to record themselves reading a book and download that onto a seed? I have heard this is possible with a yoto. I like the idea of buying an Aussie product like Birde but this is a dealbreaker for me.
